process.name: Test Web API Config (Auth - Client Credentials)

input.name: New Password
input.narrative: If this is your first login it will prompt you to change the password.

input.name: Tree Name
input.narrative: Name of the tree to be extended.

input.name: Item Name
input.narrative: Name of the item to be clicked on.

input.name: Select Item Method?
input.narrative: True by Default. Selects the node from system tab using Select Item approach. If the node is not available (Greyed out) an exception will be thrown. Use this method if you are certain the node is available for selection.

input.name: Retry MouseClick?
input.narrative: Default to True. Retries Global Mouse Click up to 3 times.

input.name: Clean Up?
input.narrative: False by Default. Set True if clean up is required at the beginning of the Action.

input.name: Requires Login
input.narrative: Flag indicating if the login info should be given too

input.name: Arguments
input.narrative: The arguments to pass to automatec, not including the authentication info

input.name: Username
input.narrative: The username that you want to authenticate against.

input.name: Password
input.narrative: The password for the username.

input.name: Tab Name
input.narrative: Name of Tab to Click

input.name: Tree Name
input.narrative: Name of the tree to be extended.

input.name: Item Name
input.narrative: Name of the item to be clicked on.

input.name: Select Item Method?
input.narrative: True by Default. Selects the node from system tab using Select Item approach. If the node is not available (Greyed out) an exception will be thrown. Use this method if you are certain the node is available for selection.

input.name: Retry MouseClick?
input.narrative: Default to True. Retries Global Mouse Click up to 3 times.

input.name: Clean Up?
input.narrative: False by Default. Set True if clean up is required at the beginning of the Action.

input.name: Scheme Name
input.narrative: The name in which you want to call your encrpytion scheme.

input.name: Available?
input.narrative: This will tick a box that allows the encryption scheme to become available.

input.name: Database?
input.narrative: Mark as true if you want to store the scheme on the database. Please note that this will default to true.

input.name: Method
input.narrative: The encryption method used with the scheme.

input.name: Scheme Name
input.narrative: The name of the scheme you wish to select.

resource.action: Encryption Schemes - Select Encryption Scheme for Credentials

input.name: pid
input.narrative: PID to attach to

input.name: Name
input.narrative: The name you want to give the Web API.

input.name: Base URL
input.narrative: The base URL you want to give the Web API.

input.name: Enabled?
input.narrative: Default is True. True or False do you want to enable this Web API.

input.name: Item Name
input.narrative: The name of the item you want to clean up.

input.name: Item Name
input.narrative: The name of the item you want to clean up.

input.name: Item Name
input.narrative: The name of the item you want to clean up.

input.name: Item Name
input.narrative: The name of the item you want to clean up.

input.name: Item Name
input.narrative: The name of the item you want to clean up.

input.name: Authentication Type
input.narrative: The name of the type of authentication you want to use.

input.name: Expected Credential
input.narrative: The name of the credential you are expecting to have set.

input.name: Expected Expose to Process?
input.narrative: The state of the "Exposed to process" checkbox you are expecting.

input.name: Expected Parameter Name
input.narrative: The name of the parameter you are expecting to have set.

input.name: Name
input.narrative: The name of the Web API you want to select.

input.name: Expected Credential
input.narrative: The name of the credential you are expecting to have set.

input.name: Expected Expose to Process?
input.narrative: The state of the "Exposed to process" checkbox you are expecting.

input.name: Expected Parameter Name
input.narrative: The name of the parameter you are expecting to have set.

input.name: Credential
input.narrative: IF you want to, this is the name of the credential you want to set. This is optional.

input.name: Expose to Process?
input.narrative: This is optional. If you want to expose the choice of what credential to use as an input parameter.

input.name: Parameter Name
input.narrative: The name of the input parameter. If left blank this will use the default.

input.name: Name
input.narrative: The name of the Web API you want to select.

input.name: Item Name
input.narrative: The name of the item you want to clean up.

input.name: Collection Name
input.narrative: The name of the collection to act upon

field.name: Item Name
field.description: The name of the item that needs cleaning up.

input.name: Collection
input.narrative: The collection to be reversed.

input.name: Tab Name
input.narrative: Name of Tab to Click

input.name: Tree Name
input.narrative: Name of the tree to be extended.

input.name: Item Name
input.narrative: Name of the item to be clicked on.

input.name: Select Item Method?
input.narrative: True by Default. Selects the node from system tab using Select Item approach. If the node is not available (Greyed out) an exception will be thrown. Use this method if you are certain the node is available for selection.

input.name: Retry MouseClick?
input.narrative: Default to True. Retries Global Mouse Click up to 3 times.

input.name: Clean Up?
input.narrative: False by Default. Set True if clean up is required at the beginning of the Action.

exception.detail: "You have entered a clean up item the choice doesn't recognise."

input.name: Scheme Name
input.narrative: This is the name of the encryption scheme you wish to delete.
